title: influence points is arror
body: why my influence points display at the interface is 1134, but when i want to buy somethingï¼Œ it says i dont have enough ip to buy, who can help me...

replies.body: It sounds like your balance isn't in sync.  Relogging should fix this up.  Let me know!

I am having the same issue.  I saw that you mentioned try relogging.  This has been happening to me for the past few days so I have logged in and out many times over the past 3 days.  It says I have 1913 influence points, but when i go to store to buy a 1700 IP mystery champion shard it says I dont have enough IP.  What can be done to fix this?  This started happening about 3 days ago when I bought my first mystery champion shard.  Thanks

It sounds like your balance isn't updated so I poked around a bit.  Try again the next time you log in, and let me know.  If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look.
It appears to be fixed now.  Thanks!

I just had this issue today as well. I sent a ticket in explaining the issue, then told the automated response "Request a Human" (literally what the button will say), and then one of the lovely Rioters should sort you out. Rufio said he manually synced me back up and that did the trick.

My cousin has the same issue, and he has tried relogging into the client, but it hasn't solved his issue.

He has 4952 ip, and we wants to get reneketon for 4800, but it won't let him.  The only thing he recently used his ip for were the 1 ip runes. 

Should he just send a ticket if it doesn't fix itself?
Yeah, ask your cousin to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help him out individually.  We'll be happy to take a look!
